decomposed.wish: build user authentication and session management that enables secure credential validation against identity providers, configurable session token management, and protective measures against brute force attacks including failed attempt tracking and account lockout policies.

build data persistence layer with integrated cache invalidation that ensures writes propagate to primary datastore, relevant cache entries are invalidated atomically, domain events are emitted for downstream subscribers, and cache invalidation propagates correctly across replicas.

build real-time notification system via websockets that pushes events to subscribed clients, tracks delivery status, retries failed deliveries, queues notifications for disconnected clients, and delivers queued notifications on reconnection.

build analytics dashboard with custom report capabilities that aggregates data from event store, applies configurable filters, renders visualization components, supports custom report generation from data warehouse, and caches reports for repeated access.

build multi-tenant architecture with strict isolation that enforces tenant boundaries on all requests, applies tenant-specific configuration, maintains tenant context in logging, prevents cross-tenant data access, and logs security events for unauthorized access attempts.

build api rate limiting and quota management that tracks request rates per client, returns appropriate 429 responses with retry-after headers when limits are exceeded, tracks quota consumption per operation, and notifies when quota thresholds are breached.
